metadata.summary: Configure D&R rules to detect on non-EDR targets including detection events, deployment events, artifacts, audit logs, scheduled events, and billing events.
metadata.primary_use_case: Create detection rules for platform events like sensor cloning, artifact ingestion, or detection chaining beyond standard EDR telemetry

cross_refs.description: Stateful detection techniques can be applied to alternate targets like deployment and artifact events
Alternate target detections may require false positive rules for filtering
